name: Flappy Bird (itch) (x00F)
description:
Flap your very odd-looking bird through the randomly generating pipes, but don't touch them! This is a recreation of Flappy Bird by Dong Nguyen.

NOTE: PC Only

Controls:

Flap: Spacebar / Left Mouse Click / Tap (Mobile)

Check out Zigurous and his tutorials!

Zigurous - YouTube
